title: cli-agent.json
description: Configuration for FWH.Prompts and the fwh-cli-agent VS Code extension.

CliAgent.description: Root key for CLI Agent settings. Read by: extensions/fwh-cli-agent, scripts/modules/FWH.Prompts.

CliMdPath.description: Path to CLI.md. Relative to project root or absolute. Must resolve under project/workspace root.

PromptsMdPath.description: Path to prompts markdown (e.g. prompts.md). Relative to project root or absolute. Used by FWH.Prompts.

ExecuteMode.description: How to run prompts: composer (Composer + clipboard) or agent-cli (agent -p). Used by the extension.

ComposerCommand.description: VS Code command ID to open Composer when ExecuteMode is composer (e.g. composer.new).

ReinitOnStart.description: Legacy: was used by FWH.CLI.Agent (removed). Ignored by current consumers.

RunTimeoutSeconds.description: Legacy: was used by FWH.CLI.Agent (removed). Ignored by current consumers.

AgentTimeoutMinutes.description: Legacy: was used by FWH.CLI.Agent (removed). Ignored by current consumers.

AgentPath.description: Legacy: was used by FWH.CLI.Agent (removed). Ignored by current consumers.
